smbbench_settings.name: UNIQUE_RUN_IDENTIFIER
smbbench_settings.description: IMPORTANT! This is the unique identifier for this suite of benchmark tests. Be sure it is succinct & meaningful!

smbbench_settings.name: MOUNTS_PER_CLIENT
smbbench_settings.description: Number of SMB Mounts (Unique drive letters) on each host

smbbench_settings.name: JOBS_PER_CLIENT
smbbench_settings.description: Number of FIO Jobs per host (I.e. JOBS_PER_CLIENT)

smbbench_settings.name: FIO_TEMPLATE
smbbench_settings.description: Location of the template for FIO (Typically the global section)

smbbench_settings.name: QFS_Version
smbbench_settings.description: Version of the Azure Native Qumulo QFS Filesystem

smbbench_settings.name: ANQ_node_vmsize
smbbench_settings.description: VM Size used for the qumulo ANQ node

smbbench_settings.name: LOCALADMIN_PASSWORD
smbbench_settings.description: Password for the local windows user running the benchmark

smbbench_settings.name: LOCALADMIN_USERNAME
smbbench_settings.description: Username for the local windows user running the benchmark

smbbench_settings.name: AZURE_ACCOUNT_NAME
smbbench_settings.description: Account name for Azure Storage Blob container

smbbench_settings.name: AZURE_CONTAINER_NAME
smbbench_settings.description: Container name for Azure Storage Blobs

smbbench_settings.name: AZURE_ACCOUNT_KEY
smbbench_settings.description: Account key for Azure Storage Blob container

smbbench_settings.name: SMB_SHARE_NAME
smbbench_settings.description: SMB Share name for the benchmark
